item.title: ‘Star Trek: Strange New Worlds’ Delights Comic-Con With Upcoming Episode, Teases All-Puppet Installment
item.description: “We think of you all the time when we are in the writers room and we always talk about what would the fans want and love,” exec producer Akiva Goldsman told supporters in Hall H.

item.title: ‘Star Trek: Strange New Worlds’ Teases Puppet Episode for Season 4
